00042 void PointCorrespondenceKDTree::createNearestNeighborCorrespondence(PointCloud3D* pointCloud1, PointCloud3D* pointCloud2, std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>* resultPointPairs) {
00043         assert(pointCloud1 != 0);
00044         assert(pointCloud2 != 0);
00045         assert(resultPointPairs != 0);
00046 
00047         double *centroid_m = new double[3];
00048         double *centroid_d = new double[3];
00049         double maxMatchingDistance = 50;
00050 
00051         resultPointPairs->clear();
00052 
00053         /* prepare data */
00054         double** pointCloud1Points = new double*[pointCloud1->getSize()];
00055         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pointCloud1->getSize(); i++) {
00056                 pointCloud1Points[i] = new double[3];
00057                 pointCloud1Points[i][0] = (*pointCloud1->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00058                 pointCloud1Points[i][1] = (*pointCloud1->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00059                 pointCloud1Points[i][2] = (*pointCloud1->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00060         }
00061 
00062         KDtree* kDTree = new KDtree(pointCloud1Points, pointCloud1->getSize());
00063 //      cout << "k-d tree created" << endl;
00064 
00065 //      unsigned int numpts_target;
00066 //      KDtree *kd = 0;
00067 //      kd = new KDtree(Source->points_red, Source->points_red_size);
00068 //      numpts_target = Target->points_red_size;
00069 
00070         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pointCloud2->getSize(); i++) {
00071                 //if (rnd > 1 && rand(rnd) != 0) continue;  // take about 1/rnd-th of the numbers only
00072 
00073                 double queryPoint[3];
00074                 queryPoint[0] = (*pointCloud2->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00075                 queryPoint[1] = (*pointCloud2->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00076                 queryPoint[2] = (*pointCloud2->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00077 
00078                 double *closest = kDTree->FindClosest(queryPoint, maxMatchingDistance, 0);
00079                 if (closest) {
00080                         centroid_m[0] += queryPoint[0];
00081                         centroid_m[1] += queryPoint[1];
00082                         centroid_m[2] += queryPoint[2];
00083                         centroid_d[0] += closest[0];
00084                         centroid_d[1] += closest[1];
00085                         centroid_d[2] += closest[2];
00086 
00087                         Point3D firstPoint = Point3D (closest[0], closest[1], closest[2]);
00088                         Point3D secondPoint = Point3D (queryPoint[0], queryPoint[1], queryPoint[2]);
00089 
00090                         CorrespondencePoint3DPair foundPair(firstPoint, secondPoint);
00091                         resultPointPairs->push_back(foundPair);
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 //      centroid_m[0] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00095 //      centroid_m[1] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00096 //      centroid_m[2] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00097 //      centroid_d[0] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00098 //      centroid_d[1] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00099 //      centroid_d[2] /= pairs[thread_num].size();
00100 
00101         delete kDTree;
00102 
00103         return;
00104 }
